article_title: Will North Carolina Clean Up its Medicaid Program?

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: What started as a pro forma session to pass North Carolina’s budget has turned into an intervention over the state Medicaid program. And it’s about time—North Carolina spends more than $14 billion per year, has run over budget the last four, and most shocking, the agency doesn’t even know how many people are currently enrolled.
